title: Song Je-heon
text:
Song Je-Heon (; born 17 July 1986) is a South Korean <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>, who plays for <a href="Gyeongnam%20FC">Gyeongnam FC</a> in K League Classic.
Club career.
Song started his professional football career with the <a href="Pohang%20Steelers">Pohang Steelers</a> in 2009. On January 6, 2010, he transferred to <a href="Daegu%20FC">Daegu FC</a>, and became a regular in the senior squad, starting in a number of matches for the club.
